comments:
Diver:  0613N

Create a Geronimo server runtime.

Create a J2EE Web project targetting Geronimo runtime and checking the checkbox 
on creating EAR (default is non-flexible project).

Put a Java bean in Java Source, hightlight it and go through bottom-up Creation 
scenario.  The Service Deployment Configuration page has Service project, 
Service EAR project and Service EAR module empty and Service module set to 
JavaSource.  No other project or EAR is available in the drop down combo.

If I enter new project and EAR name, I got this exception:
